articles.author: Oli Welsh
articles.title: Fortnite x Dragon Ball Super event detailed, including skins, gliders, quests, and more
articles.description: In the huge crossover event, Goku, Vegeta, Bulma and Beerus arrive as skins; Power Unleashed! quests award a Shenron Glider; Kamehamehas and Nimbus Clouds come to battle royale; there’s an anime festival, an adventure island, and more
articles.content: Theres even a whole Dragon Ball theme park.

articles.title: John Wick prequel show set to debut on Peacock in 2023
articles.description: The Continental, a prequel series to the John Wick film franchise, will now debut on NBC’s streaming platform Peacock in 2023. The first three John Wick movies will also be available to stream.
articles.content: The John Wick prequel series is set to launch in 2023, on the NBC subscription service, Peacock. The Continental, a three-part series set in the Continental Hotel, was originally set to launch on Sta… [+1389 chars]

articles.title: Guillermo Del Toro’s Netflix horror anthology has a spooky first look
articles.description: Guillermo del Toro teams up with Catherine Hardwicke, Ana Lily Amirpour, Vincenzo Natali, Guillermo Navarro, Jennifer Kent, and more for a horror anthology for Netflix.

articles.description: Matt, the legendary sportsman from Wii Sports, is now available to compete against in Nintendo Switch Sports. But you’ll need a special code to do it. Here’s a brief history on the meme, and how to face him

Nintendo announced the end of fair play in Nintendo Switch Sports on Friday when the company revealed that legendary Wii Sports competitor Matt is now available for players to challenge.

articles.title: John Wick director wants to make Ghost of Tsushima movie in Japanese
